name: Stifnell, Appellant, v. Board of Adjustment

judges: Before Bell, C. J.,Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Stifnell, Appellant, v. Board of Adjustment.
attorneys: E. William Reuser, with him Torah and DeYoung, for appellants.
Russell J. Brownbaeh, Solicitor, for township, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Stifnell, Appellant, v. Board of Adjustment.
Argued January 9, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J.,Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused May 29, 1968.
E. William Reuser, with him Torah and DeYoung, for appellants.
Russell J. Brownbaeh, Solicitor, for township, appellee.
March 15, 1968:
